name: CRIME GIRL (itch)
description:
Her name is Angie Novak. She has examined our world and she has found the places where it fails. Where the system comes up short, where the flaw of the world is apparent, the very points of failure.

Some see this, and they find themselves drawn towards fixing it.

Angie is not this kind of person. Angie sees the brief seconds of failure.

She uses every one. You learn to do that, when your minutes belong to a system bigger than you, that doesn't care about you.

That's just being in high school.

Meet Angie Novak. No, there's no quip about how she has homework to do too.

(Download the BOOK to read it straight up in your PDF reader of choice, or download the PRINTOUT to make it into a small pocket sized zine!)
